item.title: Experiment #6... Goes Wrong
item.description: Dropping a string of Mentos through a tube doesn't go according to plan

item.title: The Joo Joo
item.description:
An imaginnary animal created by a pupil in Meldrum PS. This strange creature came into being as the result of the learner being involved in a games based learning project that involved the use of Samba De Amigo for the Wii.

Here we see how technology can help encourage children to do their very best in writing so that when their creature 'comes to life' with Crazy Talk then it is at its very best!

item.title: YouTube - Pitbull Feat. Lil Jon - Toma (MTV Version)
